CustomField.description: This translates the Moderator lookup field into TEXT for use in GLobal Searches - GLobal Search does NOT search lookup or formula fields so this field is used instead.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This translates the Moderator lookup field into TEXT for use in GLobal Searches - GLobal Search does NOT search lookup or formula fields so this field is used instead.
CustomField.label: Moderator (SearchField)
